statements: SELECT * FROM player_accounts;
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM player_accounts WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM player_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM player_accounts ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_accounts WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT username, email FROM player_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_accounts WHERE player_id > 50 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM player_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE 'B%';
SELECT * FROM player_accounts WHERE player_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_authentication;
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM player_authentication WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT player_id, email, password FROM player_authentication WHERE email='john.doe@example.com';
SELECT password, username FROM player_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT player_id, security_question FROM account_security WHERE player_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM player_authentication WHERE email = 'example@email.com'
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_authentication WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT player_id, password FROM player_authentication WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM account_security WHERE security_question = 'What is your favorite color?'
SELECT * FROM player_authentication JOIN account_security ON player_authentication.player_id = account_security.player_id
SELECT * FROM player_authentication;
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_authentication WHERE username = 'johndoe';
SELECT login_id, last_login, login_ip FROM login_credentials ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT player_id, security_question FROM account_security WHERE player_id = 12345;
SELECT email FROM player_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM player_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT player_id, username, password, email FROM player_authentication ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM player_authentication WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' AND player_id < 100;
SELECT login_id, player_id, last_login FROM login_credentials WHERE login_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT player_id, security_question, security_answer FROM account_security WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_authentication WHERE username = 'jane_smith');
SELECT * FROM player_authentication;
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM player_authentication WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_authentication ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT security_id, player_id, security_question FROM account_security WHERE security_id < 5;
SELECT profile_id, player_id, display_name FROM player_profile WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM player_authentication;
SELECT username, email FROM player_authentication WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT display_name, bio FROM player_profile ORDER BY profile_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM login_credentials WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL AND login_attempts < 3;

SELECT player_authentication.player_id, player_authentication.username, account_security.security_question FROM player_authentication INNER JOIN account_security ON player_authentication.player_id = account_security.player_id ORDER BY player_authentication.player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_auth WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM player_auth WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT player_id, security_question FROM account_security WHERE two_factor_enabled = true;
SELECT item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE equipped = true;
SELECT player_id, experience, health FROM player_stats WHERE level > 10;
SELECT * FROM player_auth;
SELECT player_id, email FROM player_auth WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM player_auth;
SELECT player_id, level, health FROM player_stats ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE equipped = TRUE AND quantity > 0;
